sent.orig: Andfits the grandmother, when and so on thered hat looks for the grandmother, wolf her eats.
sent.trans: 并装成祖母，等小红帽来找祖母时，狼一口把她吃掉了。

sent.orig: At this time, my grandmother came and I picked up a busy grandmother to try.
sent.trans: 这时，奶奶过来了，我忙拿起一块给奶奶尝。

sent.orig: Mother: Here are somes and juice mother. Take them to grandmother. Grandmother will get well.
sent.trans: 妈妈：这里是送给祖母的一些饼干和果汁。把它们拿给祖母。祖母将会起来的。

sent.orig: Little Red Riding Hood let herselfand went straight to Grandmother's bed: Grandmother, are you OK now?
sent.trans: 小红帽：（进了房间来到外婆的床边）外婆，你还好吗？

sent.orig: Once the grandmother are to my house and the that time heard the grandmother want.
sent.trans: 有一次，外婆来我家，那时听到外婆要来。
